data.title: Pope has urged having fewer children if “you cannot bring them up properly,” claims Vatican academy member
Canadian woman en route to spa denied entry to U.S., told she needs immigrant visa
Russian tv crew offered money to youths in Sweden to cause trouble in front of camera
Japan goes to highest alert level after North Korea fires four missiles

IBM to build quantum computers, selling machines millions of times faster than anything made before - The first practical machines will be available soon enough that developers should start working on software for them, according to executives
Trump to sign new immigration order
India: Prices of Cancer Drugs Slashed by Up To 86%
Former Trump Adviser Roger Stone Admits Collusion With WikiLeaks, Then Deletes It

Scientists want to build a super-fast, self-replicating computer that "grows as it computes" - "The researchers propose using DNA molecules to represent information based on the four-character genetic alphabet - A, G, C, and T - rather than the binary alphabet of 1s and 0s"
U.S. Customs Agents Are Now Coercing Travelers for Mobile Passwords

North Korea has retaliated and designated the Malaysian ambassador to the hermit kingdom as persona non grata and demanded the envoy leave the country within 48 hours. However, the Malaysian Ambassador had already been recalled on Feb 22
Polluted environments kill 1.7 million children a year: WHO
The European Union has condemned North Korea for firing four banned ballistic missiles and said it would consult with Japan and international partners on how to react.
Hero dog who 'stopped mother from drowning her son' saved from being put down by petition

Angela Merkel calls for calm after Erdogan's 'Nazi practices' accusation: “Nazi comparisons are always absurd and out of place, because they only lead to trivialising of the Nazis’ crimes against humanity,”
